notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: C.R.O., L.I., C.P. and L.N. conceived the study and L.N., L.I. and M.D.B. designed the study, laboratory protocol and statistical approach. L.N. and C.R.O. obtained the necessary permissions and collected the data. L.N., L.I. and M.D.B. performed the laboratory work. L.N., M.D.B. and K.T. performed the statistical analyses. C.P., J.L.N., P.T. and A.R.-G. provided feedback and discussion throughout the process. C.R.O. compiled existing field data. L.N., M.D.B. and L.I. drafted the manuscript. All authors approved the final manuscript.
